articles.content: Were expecting BMW to reveal the new 4 Series sometime in June, which should be the first of several 4 Series reveals. Spy photos show the regular coupe beginning to lose camouflage as hotter performance models continue testing. The latest sightings come from… [+1608 chars]

articles.author: Charlie Hall
articles.title: Crusader Kings 3 trailer announces September release date - Polygon
articles.description: Paradox Interactive’s Crusader Kings 3, the grand strategy game of love and war, launches Sept. 1 on PC. Watch the new story trailer, and get up to speed on how the sequel changes the formula of the classic game.
articles.content: The king is dead. Long live the king

articles.author: Dean Takahashi
articles.title: Intellivision taps Xbox veteran J Allard as global managing director - VentureBeat
articles.description: Intellivision Entertainment has hired Xbox veteran J Allard, one of the creators of Xbox Live, as its global managing director.
articles.content: Intellivision Entertainment has hired Xbox veteran J Allard as its global managing director. Allard will report to Intellivision CEO Tommy Tallarico, and he will take charge of a wide variety of operations that are critical in launching the companys retro gam… [+1193 chars]

articles.description: Complete the special tasks to catch a special Groudon.
articles.content:
The third leg in the month-long Pokémon Go events is about to begin and trainers will transport themselves to the Hoenn region for a new list of tasks and rewards.
The Hoenn Throwback Event will begin this Friday and will be similar to the Kanto and Johto ev… [+2498 chars]

articles.title: Nvidia Jetson Xavier NX review: Redefining GPU accelerated machine learning - Android Authority
articles.description: The Xavier NX development kit allows you to use Nvidia's machine learning module for product development and as a desktop.
articles.content: Nvidia launched the Jetson Xavier NX embedded System-on-Module (SoM) at the end of last year. It is pin-compatible with the Jetson Nano SoM and includes a CPU, a GPU, PMICs, DRAM, and flash storage. However, it was missing an important accessory, its own deve… [+10931 chars]
